title: 62. Grieving the Parent You Never Had
description:
Hey girl!
 
In this episode,  we talk about the very real feelings we deal with when coming to grips with the narcissistic abuse, emotional abuse, and absence we felt from our parents. We talk about grieving the love we never received and how to be compassionate with ourselves when moments like this hit us hard. Stay tuned for more.
 
Click here to join the no more codependent thought patterns masterclass!
 
(or visit beatricekamau.com/programs)
 
Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
